title: Fakhr al-Mulk
text: Fakhr al-Mulk was a <a href="Persians">Persian</a> bureaucrat, who served as the <a href="vizier">vizier</a> of the <a href="Seljuk%20Empire">Seljuk</a> <a href="sultan">sultan</a> <a href="Berkyaruq">Berkyaruq</a> () from 1095 to 1099, and later vizier of the Sejluk prince and ruler of <a href="Khurasan">Khurasan</a>, <a href="Ahmad%20Sanjar">Ahmad Sanjar</a>, from 1101 to 1106. He was the eldest son of the prominent Seljuk vizier <a href="Nizam%20al-Mulk">Nizam al-Mulk</a>.
